abstract: Configures the icon used by alerts.

declaration.code: nonisolated func dialogIcon(_ icon: Image?) -> some Scene

overview:
## Discussion

In macOS, this icon replaces the default icon of the app.

items.description: Configures the icon used by dialogs within this view.
items.name: dialogIcon(_:)

items.description: Enables user suppression of dialogs and alerts presented within `self`, with a default suppression message on macOS. Unused on other platforms.
items.name: dialogSuppressionToggle(isSuppressed:)

items.description: Enables user suppression of an alert with a custom suppression message.
items.name: dialogSuppressionToggle(isSuppressed:)

items.description: Enables user suppression of dialogs and alerts presented within `self`, with a custom suppression message on macOS. Unused on other platforms.
items.name: dialogSuppressionToggle(_:isSuppressed:)

items.description: Enables user suppression of an alert with a custom suppression message.
items.name: dialogSuppressionToggle(_:isSuppressed:)

title: dialogIcon(_:)
